2.1.name: wordpress/easy-speak-mailing-list
2.1.description:
This plugin utilizes a wordpress widget and jquery to create a widgetized mailing list subscription form. This plugin stores user data in a database table and is converted to a '.csv' and sent to the website admin as requested. Once downloaded you can sell it?? Use it for Marketing? Whatever you like. The plugin has been updated to check the email address is formatted correctly to try and reject spam!

The plugin now also allows admins to send newsletters or any email to the entirety of the mailing list's subscribers without even having to leave Wordpress!. This email also contains an auto unsubscribe option to make your life easier and protect you from unhappy users.

This plugin is no longer actively supported

Cheers Luke
